title: Authentication with valid credentials
description: Verify that a user can successfully log in with valid username/email and password for all supported roles.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Input valid username/email and password for each role (admin, hr, recruiter, manager, employee)
Click the login button
Confirm login is successful and user is redirected to the appropriate role-based dashboard
Verify valid JWT token is issued and stored securely

title: Authentication failure with invalid credentials
description: Verify that the system prevents login and displays an error message when incorrect credentials are entered.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Input invalid username/email and/or password
Click the login button
Confirm login fails and an appropriate error message is displayed
Verify no JWT token is issued or stored

title: Role-based route access control
description: Verify that users can only access routes and features authorized for their role, with unauthorized access blocked.

steps.description: Login as each role (admin, hr, recruiter, manager, employee)
Attempt to directly access routes and features not permitted for the logged-in role
System denies access with appropriate error or redirection
Access permitted routes and features for each role
Verify successful access and correct UI elements display

title: Admin dashboard metrics validation
description: Verify that the Admin Dashboard displays correct, real-time system-wide analytics including user activity, recruitment funnel, and department distribution.

steps.description: Login as Admin
Validate that user activity charts, recruitment funnel charts, and department distribution data reflect backend data accurately
Confirm that dashboard metrics update on data change or refresh

title: HR Manager dashboard KPI and pipeline accuracy
description: Verify that HR Manager Dashboard displays accurate employee metrics, recruitment pipeline data, interviews, leave, and payroll summary.

steps.description: Login as HR Manager
Confirm that KPIs and recruitment pipeline visualizations match with stored data
Verify interview schedules and leave management statuses are displayed correctly
Validate payroll overview numbers are accurate

title: Recruiter dashboard candidate scoring and scheduling
description: Verify that recruiter dashboard shows job pipeline, AI screening scores, candidate rankings, and allows interview scheduling.

steps.description: Login as Recruiter
Ensure job pipeline reflects posted jobs correctly
Check AI screening scores and candidate ranking data accuracy
Schedule an interview for a candidate
Confirm interview scheduling is saved and notified properly

title: Employee job application with AI screening trigger
description: Verify that employees can apply to job postings with resume upload and that AI screening is triggered automatically.

steps.description: Login as Employee
Browse internal job board and select a job to apply
Submit application with resume upload
Verify application status is updated to 'Submitted'
Confirm AI screening background job is triggered and candidate scoring is generated

title: AI resume parsing and scoring with background job processing
description: Validate AI-powered resume parsing, vector embedding generation, semantic matching and scoring processes work correctly asynchronously.

steps.description: Submit multiple resumes for screening
Ensure resume parsing extracts correct candidate information
Verify vector embedding and semantic matching outputs are generated and stored
Check AI candidate score is computed and accessible from recruiter dashboard

title: Job postings management CRUD operations
description: Verify Create, Read, Update, and Delete functionality for job postings by authorized roles.

steps.description: Login as HR Manager or Recruiter
Create a new job posting with all required fields
Confirm new job appears on internal job board
Update job posting details
Verify changes persist and reflect in UI
Delete job posting
Confirm job posting is removed from job board and backend

title: Employee attendance check-in/out and summary
description: Validate attendance tracking including check-in/out functionality, daily summaries and trend analysis charts.

steps.description: Login as Employee
Perform check-in at start of workday
Confirm check-in time is recorded accurately
Perform check-out at end of workday
Confirm check-out time is recorded
View attendance summaries for the week/month
Validate trend analysis charts reflect correct aggregated data

title: Payroll generation and payslip access
description: Verify payroll computations including tax and allowances, generation of payslips, and employee access to salary history.

steps.description: Login as HR Manager or Admin
Generate payroll for current period
Confirm payroll calculations include taxes and allowances correctly
Login as Employee
Verify access to current and historical payslips
Validate payroll data matches generated reports

title: Leave request submission and approval workflow
description: Validate leave request creation by employees, approval or rejection by managers, and leave balance updates.

steps.description: Login as Employee
Submit leave request with valid dates and leave type
Confirm request status is 'Pending' and visible in leave calendar
Login as Manager
Approve the pending leave request
Verify employee leave balance is updated accordingly
Reject a leave request and check status updates
Confirm rejected requests are flagged and employee notified

title: Performance review multi-factor tracking and trend visualization
description: Verify multi-factor performance reviews inputs and corresponding trend analysis visualizations are accurate and accessible.

steps.description: Login as Manager
Input performance review data for direct reports
Confirm data is stored and visible on employee profiles
Login as Employee
View performance trends in radar and line charts
Validate chart data matches stored review metrics

title: Real-time notification delivery via WebSocket
description: Verify that real-time notifications are sent and displayed correctly through WebSocket to all relevant users.

steps.description: Trigger notification events (e.g. interview scheduled, leave approved)
Verify notifications are received instantaneously at user UI Notification Center
Check notification content accuracy
Test notification handling when user is offline (email fallback)
Verify email notifications are sent correctly

title: Conversational AI chat interface with voice interaction
description: Validate chat interface supports text and voice inputs and integrates conversational AI for candidate screening.

steps.description: Open AI chat interface as candidate or recruiter
Send text message to conversational AI
Confirm AI responds appropriately and timely
Use voice input functionality to interact via Web Speech API
Verify speech-to-text works accurately and AI processes input correctly

title: Light/Dark theme toggle and responsiveness
description: Check that the UI supports switching between light and dark themes and remains responsive across device sizes.

steps.description: Toggle between light and dark themes from UI settings
Verify consistent styling and color scheme changes across all pages
Resize browser window to various dimensions including mobile viewports
Confirm UI components adjust layout accordingly and remain usable

title: API performance and response validation under load
description: Validate that critical API endpoints respond within defined performance thresholds and maintain correctness under simulated load.

steps.description: Simulate concurrent user API calls for login, job browsing, application submission, and data fetching
Measure and verify response times are within defined limits
Ensure API responses contain accurate and complete data without errors

title: Database data integrity and hierarchical employee CRUD
description: Verify that CRUD operations on employee records maintain organizational hierarchy and data integrity.

steps.description: Create a new employee with valid organizational role and manager assigned
Verify new employee appears correctly in hierarchy with reporting lines
Update employee details including role changes
Confirm updates are correctly reflected and hierarchy is maintained
Delete an employee and check that subordinate employees are handled as per business rule (reassignment or null manager)
Verify no orphaned records and data consistency retained
